nl.vumc.trait.oc.main
Class Main

java.lang.Object
  nl.vumc.trait.oc.main.Main
Direct Known Subclasses:
CleanODM, ExtractODM, ImportODM, ListStudies, ListSubjects
public abstract class Main
extends java.lang.Object

Skeleton for any program contained within this package. It provides and initializes basic support data structures for xml handling and command line parsing.

Author:
Arjan van der Velde (a.vandervelde (at) xs4all.nl)
